verbs.description: [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: delivered] [ARG1: a thinly veiled takedown of President Donald Trump 's policies and emerging worldview] .
French President Emmanuel Macron on Wednesday delivered a thinly veiled takedown of President Donald Trump 's policies and [V: emerging] [ARG0: worldview] .
